name: Seel

evolution.description: Seel can evolve into Dewgong at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Sea Lion Pokémon. Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Ice and Fire damage.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.description: While it is snowing or hailing, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency modifier at the end of each of its turns.
